hyp: State-owned enterprises and dominant private enterprises entered the old revolutionary areas of southern Jiangxi.

From September 26 to 27, in order to deepen and expand the educational achievements on the theme "Remember the beginning, remember the mission", the Central Office for Civil-Military Integration, the State Administration of National Defense Science and Industry, and the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce jointly organized a study on "State-owned enterprises and leading private enterprises entering the old revolutionary areas in southern Jiangxi".

Jin Zhuang Long, deputy director of the Central Civil-Military Integration Office, Xu Lejiang, deputy director of the CPC Central Committee, deputy secretary of the CPC Central Committee of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, Zhang Kejian, director of the State Administration of Defense Science and Industry, Li Bingjun, deputy secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Committee and Ganzhou Municipal Party Committee, took part in the investigation.

Among the enterprises participating in the research activities are eight military industrial groups, such as China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation Limited, Hunan Rare Earth Metals Research Institute, and ten state-owned enterprises, such as Ren Xiang Group and 15 leading private enterprises.

During this period, the researchers visited the memorial garden of the Central Red Army Long March starting point, remembered the revolutionary forefathers, received the traditional education of the revolution, reviewed the difficult journey of the Red Army during the Long March, conducted on-site research on seven enterprises and one testing center in Ganzhou, held a symposium, and concluded eight cooperative projects and signed a contract on the spot.
At the Symposium on Investigation Activities, Ganzhou City introduced its unique industrial advantages and introduced high-quality projects to the participating enterprises.

In a statement, China Weapon Industry Corporation Limited, China Steel Research Technology Corporation Limited, Xi'an Tianhe Defense Technology Co., Ltd. and Jiangxi Jinli Permanent Magnet Technology Co., Ltd. on behalf of the military industrial conglomerate, civilian population state-owned enterprises, private enterprises and local enterprises respectively, said that they will continue to strengthen state-owned enterprises, leading private enterprises and Jiangxi Province and Ganzhou City, gradually broaden the areas of cooperation, help industrial transformation and upgrade, and promote the realization of high-quality development in the old revolutionary areas.

As a result of this research, the unique industrial development advantages of the old revolutionary areas in southern Jiangxi were further understood, the key tasks of the current economic and social development in the old revolutionary areas were clearly defined, and the belief that the state-owned and private enterprises serve the people and work on their behalf was strengthened.
Beijing market supervision department to carry out comprehensive law enforcement on commodity price stability

Beijing, September 27 (reporter Du Yan) to strengthen the pre-festival market supervision and law enforcement, the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Market Supervision in the National Day before the inspection of more than 2,000 operating entities.

The inspection showed that the supply of basic necessities of life such as grain, oil, meat, fruit, vegetables and custard sold in the market was sufficient, commodity prices were basically stable and no serious violations of laws and regulations were observed.

Today, reporters from the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Market Supervision learned that the bureau launched the "Comprehensive Law Enforcement Inspection Day" activities in the city, focusing on key areas, such as prices, industry and commerce, quality supervision, food and drugs, and commerce, all elements of law enforcement inspection, the entire link, the overall regulation of market operation order.

According to the introduction, the five law enforcement teams of the Beijing Municipal Administration of Market Administration, namely, price, industry and commerce, quality supervision, food and medicine, and commerce, work in tandem and in close coordination.
During the inspection, law enforcement officials focused on price behaviors, advertising, food safety, metrology standards and production safety systems.

According to the inspection results, the supply of necessities of life such as grain, oil, meat, fruit, vegetables and custard sold on the market is sufficient, commodity prices are basically stable, business operators can operate in compliance with the law, no serious violations of laws and regulations have been found, and market operation order is generally stable.

The Beijing Administration of Market Administration said that during the National Day, it will strengthen emergency duty, carry out continuous market inspection and inspection, deal with various market supervision issues quickly according to law, and deal with the illegal business activities reported by the public, once verified, will deal with them strictly according to law and earnestly safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of consumers.
Royal Cambodian Academy of Sciences Confucius Institute "China in My Heart" Chinese essay competition unveiled

The "China in My Heart" Chinese Essay Competition under the theme of the 70th anniversary of New China was unveiled and a ceremony was held at the Confucius Institute of the Royal Cambodian Academy of Sciences on May 26.
The award was presented by the Chinese Ambassador to Cambodia, the representative of the Cambodian National Council, and the President of the Jiangxi Chamber of Commerce of Cambodia, Wei Siyu.

According to the Chinese president of the Confucius Institute of the Royal Cambodian Academy of Sciences, Chai Keqing, the competition lasted two months and was aimed at Cambodian primary and secondary school students (including students with special education) and university students (including social workers).

Diplomats from the Chinese Embassy in Cambodia presented certificates of recognition to Lim Wei Cai, the first prize winner of the University Group, and Guo Lina, the first prize winner of the primary and secondary school groups.

Chaikeqing said that the entries will be opened according to the composition of the university and primary and secondary schools, and invited senior Cambodian Chinese experts to form a judging committee, through the preliminary assessment, reassessment and final assessment, the final selection of the university group first prize, second prize, second prize, third prize, 10 outstanding awards; primary and secondary groups first prize, second prize, five prizes, third prize, 10 outstanding awards, 20 outstanding awards.
'It's been 15 years of learning Chinese and it's had a huge impact on us, 'said Lin Wei, a winner of the first prize in the university group.

We hope that the young generation will continue to add to the friendship between China and Cambodia after the essay contest, which is a verbal description of the well-being of Cambodia and the traditional friendship between the two countries.
The picture shows the guest and the winning contestant.

Guo Lina, a winner of the first prize in the primary and secondary school category, said that as an overseas Chinese, there was a different excitement about the opportunity to express "China in my heart" through the native script and win the prize.

Organizers said the competition has not only created an atmosphere of positive relations between China and Cambodia, but also attracted more and more Cambodian students to learn Chinese and study in China.

26 (Xinhua) -- Iran has begun to use advanced centrifuges to accelerate the production of enriched uranium, further violating the 2015 nuclear agreement with world powers, the United Nations International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) reported Thursday.
According to the IAEA report, advanced centrifuges at Iran ’ s Natanz Nuclear Facility “are accumulating or are ready to accumulate enriched uranium ”.
Since US President Donald Trump pulled out of the nuclear deal last May and imposed sanctions on Iran, Iran is gradually violating the limits of the nuclear deal reached with the big powers in 2015.
According to the agreement, Iran can extract uranium only from the first generation of IR-1 centrifuges.
Other signatories to the deal, Britain, China, France, Germany and Russia, have been trying to salvage it, but Tehran has repeatedly accused Europe of not doing enough.

According to Kyodo news agency, Japan's Foreign Minister Motohide Yoshikawa held talks with his Russian counterpart Sergey Lavrov in New York on the afternoon of April 25, confirming that they would press ahead with the conclusion of a peace treaty encompassing the northern four islands (disputed islands of Japan and Russia) and the southern Kuril Islands (Kuril Islands).
This was the first consultation with Russia after Maoki became Foreign Minister, as head of the negotiations leading to the conclusion of a peace treaty.
Mr Mogi told the Russian side that “including the promotion of joint economic activities [in the four northern islands], we hope for real consultation ”.
According to the Japanese government, the talks did not go into detail about the territory.
In December 2018, the Russian and Japanese leaders agreed to accelerate negotiations between the two countries.
During the talks, the two foreign ministers welcomed the progress made in the consultations on joint economic activities in the fields of tourism and waste disposal.
"Hopefully, the successful implementation will lead to the next step," he said on a pilot tour scheduled for October.
The talks also confirmed Lavrov's November visit to Japan to coincide with the Group of Twenty (G20) foreign ministers' meeting in Nagoya.
Tuionetoa was elected as the new Prime Minister of Tonga.
Nuku'alofa: The parliament of the South Pacific island nation of Tonga has elected a new Prime Minister to replace former Prime Minister Akilisi Pohiwa, who died of illness earlier this month.
According to the main Tongan media website MATANGI, the Tongan Parliament is unicameral and consists of 26 members.
In a parliamentary vote on the same day, Tuilagi was elected with 23 votes, defeating the rival Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Infrastructure and Tourism, Selasi Sika.
Tonga is a constitutional monarchy with separation of powers between the executive, legislative and judicial branches.
Tuileries also had to accept an appointment from the king.
The next Tongan parliamentary elections will be held in 2021.

In addition, the Serbian team was not the "butchered" lamb, the two sides fought five games against the Netherlands, Serbia 2 in the final 3 – 2 reversal of the Netherlands' main team, thus showing the depth of the squad.
Before the third phase of the competition began, Lang Binh said that both the Dutch and the Chinese teams were not playing well: "The games in Osaka will be very tough.
Now the clarion call for defending the title has blown, and the race has really entered the "white-hot phase."

On the strength of the squad, the Chinese women's volleyball team in the opponent, is only the last key, but also depends on the women's volleyball girls can play the normal level, in the game to free themselves.

The University of Macao is hosting the "Second Macao Stem Cell Symposium" today (May 27), which will attract more than 100 experts and scholars from the United States, Singapore, Mainland China, Hong Kong and Macao to share and discuss the latest techniques and developments in stem cell research.
The Vice-Chancellor (Research) of the University of Macau, Mr David Ge Wei, said that the symposium would help boost the research and development of stem cells in Macao.

Mr Ge said that as a leading international university on the west coast of the Greater Bay Area, the University was committed to building a talent training base and technology innovation centre for the west coast of the Greater Bay Area.
The symposium will bring together experts in stem cell research at home and abroad to share the latest technology, which will help boost the research and development of stem cells in Macao.
The Director of the University's School of Health Sciences, Mr Tang Chu Xia, said that in recent years, the University had continued to strengthen its research innovation and transformation.
At the conference, a group of distinguished scholars shared cutting-edge knowledge and technology of stem cell research.

Ji Weizhi, Member of the Chinese Academy of Sciences and Dean of the Primate Transformation School of Science and Technology, Kunming University of Science and Technology, Yunnan, explained the use of 3D culture system to study the process and molecular mechanism of monkey and human embryos in vitro; Jing Naihe, a researcher at Shanghai Institute of Biochemical Cell of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, described the temporal and temporal changes in cell lineage decisions and tissues after embryo implantation in mice from a single cell and molecular level; and Wang Yong, a professor at Pennsylvania State University, showed how to use biomaterials hydrogel to simulate a stem cell micro-nest for survival and delivery.

The Deputy Dean (Research) of the Faculty of Health Sciences of the University of Australasia, Mr Xu Renhe, the Assistant Director of the Faculty, Mr Chan Kwok-kai, and the Associate Professor of the Australasian Institute of Chinese Medicine, Dr Wang Chunming, also presented the latest findings.

Organized by the Faculty of Health Sciences of the University of Macau, the Second Macau Stem Cell Symposium was co-hosted by the Institute of Chinese Medicine of the University of Macau and the National Key Laboratory of Chinese Quality Research of the Macau University of Science and Technology.
The seminar consisted of 11 academic papers on embryo development and tissue formation, transgenic medicine, mechanism research and application of stem cells, and biomaterials and applications.
There was a lively atmosphere, with participants actively discussing and sharing the latest research and views on relevant technologies.

Mr Tsui said the symposium provided a platform for exchanges and collaboration between stem cell experts from the Greater Bay Area and other regions, as well as a valuable learning opportunity for students.
The National Medal of the People's Republic of China and the State Medal of Honor will be solemnly presented.

Subject to the approval of the CPC Central Committee, the ceremony of conferring State medals and state honors of the People's Republic of China will be solemnly held on September 29 at 10 a.m. at the Great Hall of the People.

XI Jinping, general secretary of the CPC Central Committee and chairman of the Central Military Commission (CMC) will give medals of "Order of the Republic" and "Order of Friendship" and "State Honor" to the recipients of state medals and honorary titles respectively and make important speeches.

With the approval of the CPC Central Committee, the ceremony of conferring State medals and state honors of the People's Republic of China will be solemnly held on September 29 at 10 a.m. at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing.
This is the Order of the Republic.

The "Order of the Republic" shall be made up of the national emblem, the five-pointed star, the Yellow River, the Yangtze River, the peaks, the peonies and other elements, and the chain of arms shall be made of Chinese knots, rudiments, orchids, etc., and the whole shall be made of cold-pressed molding, filament inlaying and enamel.
This is the Order of Friendship.

The Order of Friendship is presented in gold and blue with peace pigeon, earth, handshake, lotus flower and other elements on the body, and Chinese knots, evergreens, peonies, jade jade jars and bluegrass on the chain.
This is the National Medal of Honor.

With red and gold as the main colors, the medal of the State Honor has five stars, Tiananmen Gate, Peony, Flag, Light, etc., and Chinese knots and flowers are used in the chapter chain. The overall use of cold-pressed molding, filament inlaying and enamel etc., symbolizes the great contribution made by the recipients of the State Honorary Designation in all fields.

The award ceremony will be broadcast live on the Central Radio and TV Station, Xinhua Net, People's Network, CCTV Network, China Network and other key central news sites, as well as the People's Daily Client, Xinhua Client, CCTV News Client and other new media platforms.
"For 70 years NATO's deterrent and defensive measures have been based on maintaining technological superiority," Stoltenberg said in a speech at the United States Military Academy at West Point.
But times are changing, he said.
"We are encountering increasing competition," Stoltenberg said.
We should therefore redouble our efforts now to be sure that no one will overtake us.
"Some of the new technologies are not being developed by NATO members, but in authoritarian countries," he said.
The Chinese company is looking at 5G networks.
Russia is developing an independent Internet and investing heavily in the next generation of weapons, such as hypersonic missiles.
Stoltenberg said NATO's future security "depends on the ability to understand, accept and apply the latest advanced technologies."

Jilin Kindergarten Environment Protection Concept from the Doll Catch
On the 27th, a kindergarten in Jilin City, Jilin Province, launched a garbage sorting education class to teach young children to distinguish recyclable garbage from other types of garbage.
It is reported that this is the first time garbage classification into the local early childhood education classroom.
A few days ago, the nine departments of Jilin Province jointly issued the "Jilin Province to promote the work programme of sorting and disposing of municipal household refuse".
In 2019, the government of the province decided to carry out a mandatory classification of domestic waste in prefecture-level cities.
The city of Jilin is one of them.
We hope that through this campaign, we can realize the effect of using children to lead families and kindergartens to lead society, and advocate the concept of environmental protection.
Hosting the event, Hi Fan International Kindergarten Executive Director Liu Lijuan said.
On the same day, the director of the garden read out the environmental initiative, hope that the waste classification from the children.
After the children performed the "Low Carbon Beibei" dance, the group made garbage sorting small game.
The tutor also handed out "recyclable" "other garbage" stickers, advised the children to go home, stuck the stickers on the trash cans and recorded a video.
Liu Lijuan introduced, the kindergarten has always advocated the concept of low-carbon, green environmental protection, the regular opening of environmental lecture hall.
In the garden garbage disposal site also set up classifiable garbage cans, marked on the release category.
Teachers teach children what to recycle
According to preliminary statistics, in 2018, the city of Jilin produced an estimated 5,465,000 tons of municipal solid waste, all of which was disposed of at the municipal solid waste disposal site.
Of this total, 3.2929 million tons were disposed of in sanitary landfills and 2.0923 million tons were burned.
After many years of efforts, every city and county in the province has the ability to deal with domestic waste innocently.

The Jilin Province's Work Program for Promoting the Classification and Handling of Urban Domestic Waste has been issued, which clearly calls for the further development of activities such as sorting garbage into schools, teaching materials and classrooms, as well as the creation of songs, ballads, cartoons, and micro-videos to enhance the interaction between students and parents and achieve the effect of "educating a child, influencing a family, motivating a community and cultivating a new generation".
Data released by Mazda on September 27 showed global sales of 117,015 vehicles in August.
Sales in China fell 21 per cent as a result of under-delivery of new models and lower prices.
Domestic sales were down 6 per cent and demand for the last shuttle train was limited before the October consumer tax hike.
Mazda sold 17,729 vehicles in China in August.
As of August 2018, sales were down 13% from the previous year.
Sales of the CX-4, China's dominant dedicated SUV, were down 14%.
"CX-4" 2016 has been on the market for a long time now, and the effect of the new cars has declined.
As a result of standing in the long-term perspective to improve brand value strategy to reduce price, it is also known to have a significant impact on sales.
Mazda's U.S. sales rose 7% year on year to 27,482 vehicles, a 14-month jump.
Sales of SUVs such as the CX-5 were boosted by one more day of sales in August than a year earlier, coupled with a "stepped-up promotional campaign such as Mazda."
Domestic sales fell 6 per cent to 14,422.
It said the pre-tax emergency rush to buy "did not go as far as it did last time [in 2014]."
Smaller cars such as the "Demio" have reduced sales.
Chirac's legacy endures
Former French President Jacques Chirac died at the age of 86.
At a time when the world is in the middle of a century of upheaval, the French politician still deserves credit for the many political legacies he left in office.
Chirac was president of France for 12 years in a charismatic manner.
He inherited the Gaullist diplomatic spirit of independence and independence, and was a staunch supporter of European integration.
At the same time, he was a strong advocate of multipolarization and multilateralism in the world and a strategic politician.
For this reason, the French media described him as "an outstanding representative of France on the world stage".
One of Chirac's favorite political decisions was to oppose the American-led war in Iraq.
Under his leadership, France joined Germany in resisting American pressure and in the forefront of the war.
A year after the war began, he predicted that the war in Iraq would lead to an intensification of terrorist activity and make the world more dangerous.
Later, Chirac ’ s warnings proved correct.
As European integration wanders and American unilateralism gains prominence, Chirac ’ s strategic thinking and choices about international politics and global affairs are no doubt revealing.
Chirac was also a French politician who made the Chinese feel familiar and friendly.

He was one of the proponents and creators of the “Golden Decade ” of China-France relations, which was driven by a statesman ’ s strategic vision since he was first elected president of France in 1995.
In 2004, China and France established a comprehensive strategic partnership, and China-France bilateral exchanges have entered a new stage.

Under Chirac, bilateral trade between China and France has grown rapidly, and the two countries have made breakthrough progress in cooperation in aviation, nuclear energy, railway transportation and other areas.
Chirac initiated the China-France Cultural Year, creating a completely new model of cultural exchanges in the history of China and France.
Chirac's lifelong love of Chinese culture was particularly impressive.
Chirac, according to Chinese diplomats who know him, can recite some of Li Bai's and Du Fu's poems, and even accurately judge the history of Chinese bronzes.
"Do not see the pyramid is not true to Egypt, do not see the terracotta warriors is not true to China" - this golden sentence from Chirac.

"The West has concerns about China's political and social development, the ecological issues arising from China's economic growth, and China's political status in the world," Chirac said in an interview with Xinhua.
But I personally have confidence in China.

I believe that China is a country with a long history of civilization, and its experience is sufficient to help it establish the concepts and values for harmonious development and to shoulder its responsibilities on the world stage for a long time to come.
I also believe that China's renaissance will bring a new creative dynamism to world culture and enrich it.
S is gone, but Chirac's political legacy and message to the world will live on.

The 7th Chinese Computer Society Big Data Conference opened in Wuhan on the 27th. Nearly a thousand experts and industry leaders in Big Data have focused on the big data research issues and explained the technological process of Big Data in the era of artificial intelligence.

Organized by the China Computer Association (CCF) and co-sponsored by the CCF Commission of Big Data Experts and Huazhong University of Science and Technology (Huazhong University of Science and Technology), the conference produced five invited reports and 188 forum reports, and established 33 thematic technical and industry subforums to exchange and discuss research achievements in the fields of Big Data Basic Theory, Big Data Education, Big Data Visualization, Big Data Finance and Science and Technology.

The CCF Big Data Conference aims to strengthen contacts and exchanges between domestic and foreign scholars in the field of Big Data, promote interdisciplinary convergence and the development of the Big Data Industry.
Formed members of the Legislative Council of the HKSAR were sent to co-sponsor the opposition to the Hong Kong Bill

The Legislative Council of the Hong Kong SAR issued a joint statement on 27 July, expressing strong opposition to the passage of the "Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Bill 2019" by the Foreign Affairs Committee of both houses of the United States Congress.

The statement, cosponsored by the 40-member Legislative Council, said the rights enjoyed by Hong Kong were enshrined in the Basic Law of the HKSAR, including the maintenance of the status of a free trade port and a separate customs territory, the conclusion and implementation of bilateral and multilateral agreements in the areas of economy, finance, shipping, trade, communications, tourism, culture and sports, and the development of trade, cooperation and relations with different countries and regions in the world under the name of "Hong Kong, China".
These rights are not vested in any foreign Government or legislature.
Hong Kong has always strictly abided by international agreements, rules, laws and business ethics, and has participated in many areas of cooperation with different countries and regions.

The statement said the move by the Foreign Affairs Committee of the United States Senate and House of Representatives to pass the relevant bill was unnecessary and was merely a response to a call by its proxies to intervene violently in Hong Kong's internal affairs and gain political leverage for their proxies in Hong Kong.
Members of Congress expressed deep regret and strong opposition to the move.
The statement noted that Hong Kong is an important trading partner of the United States and the source of the largest trade surplus.
Hong Kong has a good rule of law, a fair and free business environment and a clean society, making it a good location for American businessmen to do business.

Passage of the bill by the United States would further aggravate relations between China and the United States, at the expense of others, in addition to undermining the interests of Hong Kong and the United States itself.

"Hong Kong will, as always, unswervingly implement the principle of" one country, two systems "and continue to enjoy the rights and earnestly fulfill its obligations under the Basic Law," the statement said.
Hong Kong will continue to make its due contribution to the international community and to international trade in the past, present and future.
26 (Xinhua) -- Migration policy reform will be discussed in both houses of the French parliament next week, the European Times reported Thursday.
French President Emmanuel Macron said recently that France could not “accommodate everyone, ” but would try to do so.
Macron is reportedly trying to find a middle ground on immigration, mitigating the impact of the coming debate.

In an interview on the sidelines of the general debate of the United Nations General Assembly in New York recently, Macron expressed the hope that there is a genuine “two-pronged ” approach to immigration policy that strikes a balance between humanitarianism and efficiency.
“If France wants to be able to accept (migrants) properly, it cannot accept everyone, ” Macron said.

Macron identified four priorities for immigration policy: to grant asylum to refugees in need of protection as soon as possible; to facilitate the integration of migrants more efficiently; to receive and protect all migrants entering French territory; and to resettle more efficiently those who entered France illegally and whose stay was not appropriate.
The question of whether illegal immigrants should be protected by the National Health Assistance (AME) system was the subject of most discussion.
Macron said he would like to be able to “evaluate ” the system, but not eliminate it, but restrict it.
Following Macron ’ s comments, Le Pen, leader of the far-right National Alliance, tweeted that Macron ’ s announcement was “empty talk. ”

Senate President Richard Ruscher, a member of the right-wing Republican Party, also indirectly criticized Macron by saying that immigration policy should be discussed in a “pacified ” but“ realistic ” manner.
Left Socialist MP Vallau argued that France should “embrace more and better ” on immigration, and criticized Macron for“ manipulating ” the issue.
The report notes that the new Asylum and Immigration Act, which was enacted a year ago, has divided opinion within the ruling party but failed to placate the right-wing opposition.

In the next general election, in which the topic of immigration policy will again be the focus of attacks by the far right, Macron will need to make a difference, but he will also risk angering the ruling party ’ s inner left.
The lower house of the French National Assembly will reportedly debate immigration policy from September 30 and the Senate from October 2.
There are signs that China's A-shares are experiencing a "buying back tide," with many listed companies taking out "real money" to buy back their shares.

According to the statistics of Dongfang Wealth, a financial data provider, the total amount of repurchase of A-share listed companies in 2019 has exceeded 100 billion yuan (the same below), far exceeding the previous year's figures for the same period, and reaching an all-time high of A-share repurchase capital.

In response, Xu Yang, chairman of the Shanghai Mykolong Information Consulting Co. Ltd., said this year's low valuations in the A-share market as a whole and the repurchase of shares at relatively low prices have helped to increase the efficiency with which listed companies use their funds.
In addition, the continuous improvement of the system of share repurchase, has also promoted listed companies to actively carry out share repurchase.

Earlier this year, for example, the Shanghai Stock Exchange and Shenzhen Stock Exchange issued detailed implementation rules for listed companies to repurchase shares, providing detailed rules and guidelines for listed companies to repurchase shares.

Also according to media statistics, since this year, the listed companies that have implemented the buy-back program are mainly in infrastructure, real estate, information technology and electronic equipment manufacturing.
In addition, from the amount of repurchase payment, six listed companies have repurchased more than one billion yuan this year.
At the top of the list are Erie shares, which have been repurchased for more than 5 billion yuan.
What impact will a listed company's share repurchase have on the market?

Zhao Xijun, vice president of the School of Finance and Finance of Renmin University of China, told China News Agency that the repurchase shows that listed companies have strong economic strength and good financial position, ability to maintain stock price stability and give investors confidence.
The former is based on the company's good performance, the latter requires the listed companies and their controlling shareholders to have higher quality.
These are the core fundamentals for capital markets.
Buying back shares of listed companies helps to boost investor confidence and has a supporting effect on the stock prices of listed companies.

According to Dongfang Securities Research Report, the incremental capital of A-share market generated by share repurchases this year is expected to exceed 150 billion yuan, based on the estimated number of share repurchases by A-share listed companies as a whole since the beginning of this year and the average share repurchase price.

In the last two months, the State key cultural and preservation units Tianjin Tianhao Palace large murals "Tin Hau Shrine" restoration work on the 26th declared the end of the year, will be reopened to the public this year during the National Day.
The Hau Tin Shrine is a large traditional mural that fully reflects the life of Mazu.
With the approval of the state department, it was painted from 1991 to 1994 by Cai Changkui, the former director of the Tianjin Folk Museum.

It is known that the mural painted on the north and south walls of the Temple of Heaven, measuring 32 meters long and 2.6 meters high, is divided into two parts, using more than 30 stories, such as the birth of the queen, the sea crossing by the sea, and the ascension of the feather.
Cai Changkui said that in recent years, the Tianjin summer rainy, winter dry, this "one wet one dry" caused the rupture of the mural, the rupture part accounts for 60% of the whole mural area.

In order to protect and save the mural of Mazu's deeds, the management committee of ancient cultural street in Nankai District of Tianjin City and the Temple of Heaven initiated the restoration of the temple and the mural inside the temple.
The restoration project was led by Cai Changkui, with the participation of four famous Chinese painters.
The restoration was based on the principle of 'repair as usual', but also made partial adjustments to the original frescoes and carried out additional repairs to the less perfect areas.
In the restoration, we have also made innovations and experimentation in color, materials, ink and so on.
After the restoration, the original fresco style, spiritual, spiritual and artistic style has been maintained.
Built in 1326, the palace was originally known as the Heavenly Princess Palace and was the oldest complex of buildings in Tianjin, and one of the earliest Mazu temples in China.
On September 25, the opening ceremony of Beijing Daxing International Airport was held.
The design of Beijing Daxing International Airport Terminal implies that "Phoenix spreading wings", known as the "New World Seven Wonders".

Beijing Capital International Airport is already overloaded, carrying 100 million + passengers last year, becoming the second airport in the world to handle more than 100 million passengers per year after Atlanta Airport.
Beijing Daxing International Airport is expected to handle 45 million passengers and 20% of international flights by 2022, and 72 million passengers and 30% of international flights by 2025.
How cool is it to be the "door of a new nation"?
Beijing Daxing International Airport is located between Daxing District in Beijing and Guangyang District in Langfang City, Hebei Province.
The roof and steel structure of the terminal has a projected surface area of 180,000 square meters and is the size of 25 standard football pitches.

Beijing Daxing International Airport is the first airport in the world to have two arrival and two departure levels — the F1-F4 International Arrival, Domestic Arrival, Domestic Departure and International Departure.
It is a two-level bridge connecting the airport with the international terminal F3, F4, and the international terminal F3.
Beijing Daxing International Airport launched the first flight of the Beijing "Double Airport" era.

The new airport is a major international aviation hub, a new power source for the country, and an integrated transportation hub in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region that supports the construction of Xiong'an New Area.
During the winter and spring 2019 season, Beijing Daxing International Airport is expected to open 116 routes, including 101 domestic and 15 international.

This and Beijing Capital International Airport form a "dual hub" airport pattern with coordinated development, appropriate competition and international first-class competition.This has not only alleviated the operating pressure of the saturated capacity of the Capital Airport, but also better met the urgent need of the rapid growth of air transport in Beijing and its surrounding areas, and effectively promoted the international competitiveness of China's civil aviation industry.

In order to ensure efficiency and quality, Beijing Daxing International Airport took full account of its geographical location, the airport's relationship with the surrounding airspace and the operating environment.

For the first time, domestic airports of this size have adopted a home-grown automatic baggage handling and information management system, adopting innovative baggage transfer modes and improving baggage handling efficiency.
Beijing Daxing International Airport, the first flight, the phoenix wings show off cool flying.

The new airport, with a national production rate of more than 98%, will surely have a direct and indirect economic impact on the industries of the surrounding areas and inject incipient vitality into Beijing's economic development.
MCA Tentative November Convention Draws Up Party Age to 16
At the first meeting of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (MCA) in early November, it was proposed to revise the Party Constitution to lower the age of membership to 16.

Following Congress' decision to lower the voting age for the general election, MCA announced that it would hold its 66th Central Committee Congress this year, proposing changes to the party constitution, including lowering the MCA's age to 16 from the current 18.

The Central Committee of the MCA was due to hold its Central Committee meeting on 2 and 3 November this year, but the date may be changed due to the by-election for the MCA seat in Tanjung Biai, said Mr Sriwiak.

He said that since the Electoral Commission would meet only on 1 October to finalise the nomination date and polling day for the by-election on the seat of Dandenong, they would meet the following day, 2 October, to discuss whether to change the date of this year's Central Committee.

He also explained that the purpose of the Central Committee meeting yesterday (June 26) was to finalise the date of the congress and to amend the party's constitution, but that it was only by chance that the leader of the Indigenous Unity Party, Danyong Bi'ai, was put on the agenda for the by-election due to the tragic death of his predecessor.

List of Communist Party members of Shandong Province List of Communist Party members of Shandong Province List of Communist Party members of Shandong Province List of Communist Party members of Shandong Province
Wang Boxiang, Shandong Shouguang, born in February 1943, joined the work in 1967, has been a township party secretary, county party secretary, mayor and other positions.
In 1986, Wang Boxiang was appointed secretary of Shouguang County, Shandong Province, then known as Shouguang, Weifang poor county.

In the five years of Shouguang's tenure, Wang Boxiang, with the heart of the people, concentrated his efforts on three things: one is to promote the industrialization of vegetables; the other is to develop Shouquan salt alkali beach; and the third is to lay the foundations for the industrial transformation, so that Shouguang people henceforth bulged their pockets and raised their backs.
Shouguang farmers have a tradition of growing vegetables, but also have lessons in growing vegetables.
In the early 1980s, Shouguang farmers grew vegetables but the harvest was not sold, rotting in the ground.
Wang Boxiang investigation found that the key to grasping vegetables is to make good circulation.
Shouguang first established the vegetable wholesale market, opened the development of the market economy prologue.
Party cadres must take the lead, screw up, all the loss of the county.
In 1989, with the support of Wang Po-xiang, Wang Leyi and 17 other members of the Sanyuan ZhuCun set up 17 warm vegetable huts.

In the first year of his life, Wang Laiyi traveled to various towns and villages, where he promoted more than 5,000 vegetable sheds, which later spread to the entire county and even to the whole country.
Over a thousand years, Shoubei 1.6 million mu of land in addition to the salt and alkaline beach, is shallow sea beach.
Life in the area was very difficult.
Shounan has the vegetable shed, Shoubei how to do?
Wang Boxiang organized a hundred thousand men to stage a general war and set up camp on the wasteland.
At that time, Shoubei developed 150,000 mu of shrimp ponds, 200,000 mu of salt farms, 600,000 mu of cotton fields, and developed "Jubaobao" on saline beaches.
In July 1986, Wang attended the Weifang Industrial Conference for the first time as secretary of the Party committee.
During the meeting, the next issue of a "Weifang twelve counties industrial economic figures comparison table," at first glance industrial output value, Shouguang is good, ranked fourth.
But if the original salt is removed, Shouguang's pure industrial output is only 119 million yuan, ranking the bottom third.
Wang Boxiang with a collection of more than 70 people, run to the field "brain change."
Less than a year after coming back, the county invested $150 million in 77 projects.
Since then, it has organized "study tours" to Shenzhen, Dongguan and Shanghai.
There is a shortage of businesses, and a shortage of entrepreneurs.

Wang Boxiang presides over the conference board: The director of the factory is openly selected in the county, and 40 "enterprising and talented people" are selected and promoted to the front line of industry.
In 1991, Shouguang entered the ranks of the 100 most powerful counties in the country, and Wang Boxiang was appointed deputy mayor of Weifang.

He left behind more than 200,000 vegetable sheds, 1.2 million mu of cotton fields, salt pans, shrimp ponds, 4,854 enterprises, more than 100,000 "yuan households", is recognized by the people of the cadre.

On September 26, 2006, State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi chaired a meeting of the Foreign Ministers of China and African members of the Security Council at the United Nations Headquarters in New York.

African current Security Council members such as Côte d'Ivoire, Côte d'Ivoire, Equatorial Guinea, Equatorial Guinea, South Africa, South Africa, South Africa, Niger, Niger, Kalla, Tunisia, Foreign Minister Jehinavi, among others, attended the meeting.
Wang made four suggestions on enhancing China-Africa cooperation in the Security Council.
First, show strength by uniting.

The greatest challenge in the current international situation is unilateralism, with the direct consequence that the basic norms of international relations are challenged and the role of the United Nations is jeopardized, to the detriment of the interests of the vast number of developing countries, including African countries, as well as small and medium-sized countries.
To meet this challenge, China and the Central African Republic need hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder in order to have strength in unity.
In the Council, the three African countries speak with one voice and the focus is not just on three votes, but on the entire continent.
China and Africa stand together on no more than four votes, which will lead others to follow, influence and shape the Council's agenda.
Since 2018, China has established a "3 + 1" coordination mechanism with African members of the Security Council.
Second, resolve disputes through consultation.
China always advocates political settlement of hotspot issues.Africa has a good tradition of consultation and experience in successfully mediating with regional and sub-regional organizations.
Many of the complex dilemmas on the Council's agenda, particularly in the hot spots of Africa, are mostly the bane of colonialism, and some are directly related to external factors.
Together, we should use Chapter VI of the UN Charter well and give play to the UN's role in providing good offices and mediation.
Third, self-improvement through self-management.
African countries and peoples know Africa's problems best, and Africa has the capacity and wisdom to solve them.

The Council should focus on listening to and respecting Africa's will when dealing with African hotspot issues, should play the role of regional and subregional organizations, and should encourage and support endogenous solutions from Africa.
China is ready to strengthen coordination with Africa and resolutely promote capacity building for African peace initiatives.
Fourth, it is fundamental to development.

China and the vast number of African countries are both developing countries. We must give top priority to economic and social development and support each other in the path of development we have chosen.

China stands ready to closely connect the efforts to build the Belt and Road Initiative with the AU's Agenda 2063, the UN's Agenda for Sustainable Development 2030 and the development strategies of African countries, so as to help African countries enhance their capacity for development and eliminate the root causes of conflict.
Together, we want to push the United Nations to increase its investment in Africa's development.

In the wake of the outbreak of Ebola in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, China has provided and will continue to provide human and material assistance to the best of its ability. We are ready to coordinate our actions with African countries, mobilize more assistance from the United Nations and WHO, and play the role of the United Nations Organization Stabilization Mission in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
Neonatology and other relays save little lives.
Amazing!
A 32-week premature baby was born in his father's car on the way to the hospital after an early attack.
Thanks to the timely treatment of obstetrics and neonatal pediatricians, the relay saved his life.

Coincidentally, on the 19th, 20th, 21st, the maternity and neonatal department of Hubei Provincial Maternity and Child Care Institute received three premature babies on the road for three days in a row, while two others were born on the 120 ambulance, all 29 weeks premature.
Ms. Cheng, a second-born pregnant woman, felt a little pain in her stomach at 7 a.m. on September 19, thinking that she was 32 weeks pregnant and that the first baby was premature.
At 9: 30 a.m., Ms. Cheng packed up and told her husband to drive from his home in Xudong to the hospital.
Didn't expect the car just left the door soon, the baby can't wait to be born in the father's car vice drive.
After 20 minutes, Ms. Cheng and the baby finally arrived at the maternity building of the Hubei Provincial Maternal and Child Health Center.

Hospital security saw the distraught couple and baby, immediately informed obstetrics room, deputy chief physician Zhang Huan and other four doctors and midwife Liu Yanyan with the delivery package and umbilical cord on the floor rushed.
"At that time, the mother was lying on the back of the car, under amniotic fluid and blood, with a baby boy next to her, still attached to the umbilical cord."

Zhang Huan asked to know that the baby is a 32-week premature baby, the parents did not have time to cover the children on the road, early autumn morning has been cool, his skin is pale, no crying, limbs paralyzed.

Liu Yan rushed to the side drive to deal with the umbilical cord for the baby, Zhang Huan entered the cab, quickly opened the delivery bag, with the treatment towel and package wrapped in a few layers of wrap to keep the baby warm, and the newborn clean the respiratory tract (pictured), then carried the baby up to the 12th floor of the neonatology unit.
When the neonatal department of medical care heard the news, they rushed to the nurse's station to rescue the premature baby.
When the baby was born with a purple complexion and suffocated hypoxia, the doctor immediately intubated his trachea, and in less than a minute, the baby regained his heartbeat and skin color.
After hospital admission, the 32-week-old baby was put on a invasive ventilator, after continuous rescue, breathing smoothly, the next day has been successfully removed.
After a week of treatment, the baby's vital signs are now stable, his breathing is smooth, and he has begun to breastfeed in small quantities.

As it happens, on the 19th, 20th and 21st, the obstetrics and neonatology department of the hospital received three premature babies on the way three days in a row, and two others were born on the 120 ambulance, all at 29 weeks of age, who are now being actively treated in the neonatology department.

Sun Guoqiang, director of obstetrics at the provincial maternity and child care center, said that in recent years, women and children in the province have received many babies born on the subway or in private cars.
Sun director warns, once the pregnant mother appears abdominal pain, broken water, see red phenomenon, should come to the hospital immediately.

If in the home or on the road in the basin, the mother should try to lie flat, can be placed under the buttock blanket, etc. to prevent the baby from being born after the head hit the ground, the child immediately after birth to keep warm, as soon as possible to the nearest doctor.

Xinhua Hefei September 27, the national IPR operation public service platform in Hefei, Anhui Province released the "Global Manufacturing Innovation Index white paper.
Manufacturing has become the focus of attention in major countries around the world, according to the white paper.
This is the reporter at the "2019 World Manufacturing Congress Intellectual Property Operations and Protection Forum".

The Forum focused on IPR as an enabling force for manufacturing upgrading in China, comprehensively probing into innovative measures for IPR operation and protection in manufacturing industry from the macro perspective of policy interpretation and micro perspective of enterprise practice, further discussing hot topics on IPR protection in manufacturing industry, continuously enhancing the application capacity of IPR quality, and accelerating the construction of the intelligent upgrading edge of manufacturing industry.

One free throw up to three?
On September 27, the NBA Development League announced a trial of a new free throw rule, with each free throw being awarded only once, with the point being determined by the foul.
Shaquille O'Neal is among the NBA's stars in free-throw shooting percentage.
Under the new rules, a two-point shooting offense gets two points, a three-point shooting offense gets three points, and a two-point foul gets one point.

Wuhan Promotes Intelligent Transformation of Industrial Enterprises

Correspondent 27 from the Wuhan Municipal Government Press Office held a series of "Praise the New China Military Games", the city has accelerated the pace of industrial intellectualization this year, and implemented a maximum of 20 million yuan of transformation subsidies.
Up to now, more than 800 industrial enterprises of the scale have been collected intelligence transformation needs information.

Since this year, Wuhan has launched a plan of action for the intelligent transformation of industrial enterprises, providing free consultation and diagnosis services for industrial enterprises of the required scale and above, and proposing solutions to promote a new round of high-level technological transformation.

According to the plan, Wuhan Municipality selects a number of specialized diagnostic service institutions each year, through the opening of columns, questionnaires, door-to-door reporting, etc. to carry out intelligent transformation needs survey for all industrial enterprises above the size of the city.

Up to now, more than 800 industrial enterprises have been collected information on the intelligent transformation needs of industrial enterprises, accounting for more than one third of the city's industrial enterprises.
Five municipal diagnostic platforms have organized teams to enter enterprises in batches to carry out "one-to-one" on-site evaluation and programme validation.

At present, the city is organizing 373 intelligent renovation projects with a total investment of 29.76 billion yuan. The first 5G intelligent production line of Hongxin Communications Huazhong, the first intelligent mobile phone production line of Motorola nationwide, the first mass-produced satellite production line of Siemens transformer in Wuhan, the first intelligent production line of new veterinary drugs in the world, and the first intelligent production line of Aobang Intelligent Home Internet Intelligent Factory have been started.
In addition, Wuhan has also increased financial support for intelligent transformation projects.

This includes investment in the actual completion of the intellectualized transformation of industrial enterprises, up to 20 million yuan in transition grants of 8% of the investment in equipment hardware and soft investment in R & D.

At the same time, financial institutions such as joint banks and Wuhan branches of Zhejiang firms have been actively engaged in providing individualized financial services specifically for the intelligent transformation of industrial enterprises, in an effort to ease the financial pressure on enterprises.
Trudeau "implodes," could he win re-election
It was Trudeau himself who stumbled out of the pit.
In recent days, the Canadian media has been bombarded with photos of Prime Minister Trudeau posing as a black man.
This was considered a clear act of racial discrimination, which immediately caused a stir in Canada.
After it happened, Trudeau repeatedly apologized to the public.
Canadians, however, aren't buying much.
Trudeau was able to lift a rock on his own feet.

As political commentator Riley et al., since the rise of the "anti-blackface movement" from the United States, Trudeau and the federal Liberals have been vocal in accusing the opposition or their own party of being "at a loss" in this regard, and have repeatedly threatened that "whoever makes this mistake should be expelled immediately".
In a nutshell, it was Trudeau himself who stumbled out of the hole.
Trudeau is the son of former Canadian Prime Minister Pierre Trudeau, young and handsome, when the debut of a "political idol" whirlwind.

After taking over as leader of the Federal Liberal Party, he fought an unexpectedly good fight in the 2015 federal legislative election, in which the federal Liberal Party won a valuable single seat in the lower house.

At the time, Trudeau proposed a number of compelling political platforms and ideas, such as “ethnic and gender equality ”,“ eco-environmental ”, and “economic revitalization, ” with an emphasis on eliminating corruption and“ the winds of injustice. ”
In his five years in office, however, he has gone from strength to strength in almost all of these areas, from the “high to the low. ”

On the issue of "ethnicity and gender equality", apart from the "blackface" incident, he had "paid lip service" to a series of issues relating to aborigines, which led to aboriginal groups and leaders moving protest tents to the Capitol Hill gate on the occasion of Canada's 150th anniversary.
In the fight against corruption, at the end of last year and at the beginning of this year, Trudeau became embroiled in the Lanvin affair.

It was revealed that the construction and engineering company of his hometown "Lanwanling" major irregularities favouritism, to the investigation of the department and officials to pressure the latter "elevated your hands."
Moreover, Trudeau, when things went wrong, moved to anger the disclosure officer – Wang Zhoudi, the Canadian attorney general at the time, who was the first to disclose the fraud.
Although the case itself is questionable, the suspicion is difficult to wash away.

Many observers have pointed out that the collapse of the Trudeau administration during his five years in office was largely the result of his own “pit ”, and that the largest pit was the“ pit of the tiger and the snake ”, the “pit of the fruit, ” and the“ pit of the law. ”

According to Canada ’ s most authoritative Angouse-Reid poll, since 2015, support for Trudeau has slipped from more than 60% to more than 30%, while opposition has jumped from less than 30% to more than 60%.

While other opposition parties and their leaders have fared equally badly, even a significant share of voters who still want to vote for the FPÖ now look askance at the federal prime minister and leader of the ruling party.
With a new federal election set to take place on October 21, can Trudeau repeat the victory he won five years ago?
The answer may be one word: Hard.

Whether from the enterprise competition level, consumer experience level, or from the regional aviation integration, Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei development integration level, have far-reaching impact and positive significance.
Beijing Daxing International Airport officially opened on September 25.
According to the Beijing Development and Reform Commission, the opening of Daxing International Airport will enhance the capital's aviation service capacity.

After Shanghai, Beijing becomes the second city in China to have two airports, with Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport serving mainly domestic air traffic and Pudong Airport serving mainly international air traffic.
Daxing airport traffic, from the point of view of business development, the capital airport is more positive impact.

As of 2018, the airport has a capacity of more than 100 million passengers per year, but is still facing a significant shortfall in capacity compared to the rapidly growing business demand, especially for international routes.

In order to better serve domestic and international passenger travel and business trips, and in line with Beijing's urban development trend of increasing openness to the international market, Daxing International Airport is set to become a large international hub airport with an annual passenger throughput of 100 million passengers and cargo and postal throughput of 4 million tons.
Therefore, the two airport positioning does not overlap, for the different customers, also have sufficient market space.

At the economic level, it is clear that the opening of Daxing International Airport will have a win-win effect, easing the strain on Beijing's air traffic, speeding up the growth of passenger and cargo throughput, and creating an incremental cake for the dual nuclear operation of Capital Airlines.

From the user's perspective, with the opening of Daxing International Airport, the future will not necessarily be focused on capital airport travel, but will also reduce the number of problems caused by over-concentration of routes, such as longer security time, slower boarding speed, indirect increase in aircraft and passengers at the airport, increase the burden of airport operations, through the capital airport traffic, but also improve the passenger travel experience.

According to the calculation of the time and cost of various transport routes to large international airports, such as from Nanwuhuan to take Beijing high-speed direct access to Daxing Airport high-speed train, 50 minutes to drive, oil money back and forth 40 yuan, high-speed charges 15 yuan; while the rail transit subway Daxing Airport Line, depending on the distance of 20 kilometers, 30 kilometers, the distance is limited to 10 yuan, 25 yuan, 35 yuan 3; and passengers can also take Beixiong intercity, from Beijing West Station to Daxing Airport Station just 20 minutes.
In general, there are a wide range of transportation options available to the public to access Daxing Airport. The cost and time are within reasonable limits.
From the point of view of trend development, Daxing Airport is a transportation hub in Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei, so it is a little distance away from the Beijing metropolitan area.
In the future, passengers in Hebei and Tianjin can enjoy more international air services provided by Daxing International Airport, as can be seen from the traffic planning of Daxing Airport.
In addition to the direct access to Daxing Airport from Beijing, there are several expressways connecting Daxing Airport with the surrounding area.

Just as passengers of Guangdong cities such as Dongguan, Foshan and Qingyuan can travel to Guangzhou Baiyun Airport by expressway, so residents of Beijing's neighboring Langfang and Xiong'an New Area will benefit from Daxing Airport to get convenient and efficient air services.

As can be seen, the opening of Daxing International Airport has not only increased the number of runways and a few aircraft, but also has far-reaching influence and positive significance from the level of enterprise competition, the level of consumer experience, the level of regional aviation integration and the level of Beijing-Tianjin development integration.
Therefore, for the Daxing airport, we should calculate not only the individual economy, but also the overall development.

The 2019 Viet Nam Forum on Economic and Social Issues was held in the province of Tseung Tien Hwa

Nguyen Tak Kin, deputy director of the National Assembly's Economic Committee, revealed that at the beginning of this year, Vietnam's economic and social development showed many new improvements and continued to grow.
The Forum focused on the economic and social issues highlighted in the first months of 2019 and proposed measures for economic and social development in late 2019 and 2020.

At the Forum, participants exchanged views on four themes, namely, economic development in 2019 and the impact of partial FTAs, some salient issues in the Vietnamese economy in 2019, salient issues in Vietnamese society and culture in 2019, and projections and recommendations for economic and social development in Viet Nam in 2020.
Delegates generally agree that the early months of 2019 have seen a slowdown in global growth and increased risks and challenges.
Trade frictions among major economies have further shrunk global trade and investment.

The International Monetary Fund has determined that, despite the uncertainties in the global economy, in which 70% of the world ’ s economies are in a state of stagnation, Vietnam ’ s economic development has achieved many good things, with macroeconomic stability and inflation under effective control, with the consumer price index rising by an average of 2.64% in the first half of 2019, the lowest rate in nearly three years.
GDP growth in the first half of 2019 will be 6.76%, down from 7.05% in the same period last year, but still higher than the same period in 2011-2017.

In forecasting the economic development trend of Vietnam in 2019-2020, Deng Deying, deputy director of the National Economic and Social Forecasting Center of Viet Nam, said that in the background of the turbulence of the world economy, the Vietnamese economy in 2019 shows a high growth momentum.

It is expected that by 2020, Viet Nam's macroeconomic performance will remain basically stable, the implementation of the free trade agreements will promote trade development, the economic restructuring and the improvement of the business environment will be further strengthened, and Viet Nam's export activities will show a downward trend due to trade frictions.

Therefore, it is necessary to strengthen the monitoring and early warning mechanism, proactively seek trade relief measures for Vietnamese export commodities, seek opportunities to expand new export markets, and facilitate the export of agricultural and aquatic products and other commodities.

At the same time, the inflation rate should be kept at a reasonable level, thereby promoting the development of auxiliary industries and supporting the development of high-tech, organic and ecological agriculture.

Be careful with plastic tea bags!

A recent Canadian study found that a packet of plastic tea bags could release billions, if not billions, of plastic particles, significantly more than a person's estimated year-round intake of microplastics.

Researchers at McGill University in Canada found that immersing plastic tea bags in a cup of almost boiling hot water (95 degrees Celsius) releases about 11.6 billion plastic particles and 3.1 billion smaller nanoparticles into the cup.
This amount is significantly higher than a person's estimated annual intake of microplastics.
According to research published earlier in 2019, the average person eats at least 50,000 plastic particles per year while inhaling the same amount of microplastics.

For the study, published in the Journal of Environmental Science and Technology, the researchers tested four different types of plastic business tea bags in Montreal stores and cafes. They opened the bags, cleaned them and immersed them in almost boiling water for five minutes before analysing them with an electron microscope and a spectrometer.
According to the study, more than 11.6 billion plastic particles were released from a single tea bag, "several orders of magnitude more than the plastic load of other foods".
Most tea bags are made of natural fibers, but many tea bag brands that use natural fibers still use plastic to seal their mouths, the report said.
Some brands have switched from paper tea bags to plastic, which the researchers tested.
The plastic particles are tiny pieces of plastic, which the researchers defined as being between 100 nanometers and 5 millimeters in size, produced mainly by the breakdown of plastic waste.
The researchers found traces of plastic particles in air, soil, rivers and the deepest trenches around the world, as well as in tap water, bottled water, seafood and beer.
In October 2018, researchers found plastic particles in human stool samples from several countries in different regions of the world.

To test the potential toxicity of the plastic particles released from tea bags, the Canadian team put water fleas into contaminated water and found that microplastics could affect the behaviour of these fleas and cause them to develop deformities.
According to the World Health Organisation (WHO), there is so far no evidence that ingesting plastic particles poses a threat to humans.
However, WHO noted that more research is needed to fully understand how these plastics spread into the environment and what impact they have on humans.

The researchers speculate that these tea bags emit large amounts of plastic particles, possibly because they come into contact with boiling water and may break down or seep out toxic substances even when "edible grade" plastic is heated above 40 degrees Celsius.
Mr Guterres said the climate emergency was the biggest threat to the survival of small island states.
There, a natural disaster can erode development gains for a generation.
This is illustrated by the devastation in Barbuda, Dominica and the Bahamas, all of which have been hit by hurricanes this year.
Approximately one quarter of the population of small island developing States lives at an altitude of 5 metres or less.
Relocation could seriously affect their society and way of life and even raise questions of sovereignty and national identity.
At a summit on climate action on Monday, small island states once again led the world in the right direction by committing themselves to carbon neutrality and 100% renewable energy by 2030.
"The climate crisis is piling up new injustices over old ones," Guterres said.
Despite their small contribution to global warming, small island developing States have paid the highest price.
Because of their middle-income status, many countries are also caught in an accelerating and unsustainable cycle of disasters and debt.
The world must act, and now is the time for big decisions and big investments in small island developing States, "he said.

Today's high-level meeting adopted a political declaration calling for the search for ways to help small island developing States manage disaster risks, invest in climate-resilient infrastructure and transition to renewable energy; and urging international institutions to help small island developing States, in particular the heavily indebted middle-income countries, to secure funding.
Small island developing States are at the forefront of efforts to protect and preserve the lifeline of the earth: the oceans.
The latest special report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, released this week, confirms that the oceans have already suffered the severe consequences of the climate crisis.
By mid-century, extreme sea-level rise, which would otherwise occur only once a century, is likely to occur annually in many regions.
The report warns that some island nations are likely to become uninhabitable without significant investment in adaptation.
Pollution, overfishing and acidification have taken a huge toll.
The world has lost half of all living coral in the past 150 years, while plastic pollution has increased tenfold in the past 40 years.
Demand from industry, shipping, mining and tourism is leading to a reduction in resources, including the maintenance of fishing grounds in many island communities.
Small island States also face high transport, energy and infrastructure costs.
They rely heavily on some outside markets, leaving them vulnerable to price fluctuations.
Some States are also grappling with the security implications of illicit trafficking in persons, arms and drugs.
"By solving a problem in the most challenging circumstances, the problem can be solved anywhere," Guterres said.
The efforts of small island developing States to achieve the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development will provide us with tools, lessons learned and examples from which the world can draw. "
He emphasized that small island developing States were a special case for sustainable development.
They require long-term attention and investment by the entire international community.

China and the United Nations and reports on climate change, sustainable development, etc. - Xinhua News Agency

Xinhua News Agency (Xinhua) -- On September 26, the Chinese delegation to the 74th session of the United Nations General Assembly (UN General Assembly) issued the "China and the United Nations -- China's Position Paper", "UN Climate Action Summit: China's Position and Action", "Progress Report on China's Implementation of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development (2019)", "Earth Big Data Supporting the Sustainable Development Goals", and four other documents.

China and the United Nations -- The Position Paper of China at the 74th Session of the United Nations General Assembly summarizes the achievements and development of cooperation between China and the United Nations over the past 70 years since the founding of New China, particularly since the 18th National Congress of the Party.
Pointing out that the push by Chinese President Xi Jinping to build a community of human destiny has become the banner of great power diplomacy with Chinese characteristics.

Guided by Xi ’ s diplomatic thinking, China is participating in international affairs in a more active and productive manner, making greater contributions and assuming more responsibilities for world peace and development.
China has always been a builder of world peace, a contributor to global development and a defender of international order.
The document introduces China's important contributions to the UN's three pillars of peace, development and human rights in 10 aspects.

To reaffirm China's firm support for and implementation of multilateralism and for the central role of the United Nations in international affairs; to point out that China's development is in harmony with and mutually reinforcing with the world's development; and to stress that in the face of the unprecedented changes in the world, a developing China will contribute more and more positive energy to the world.

The United Nations Climate Action Summit: China's Position and Action refers closely to the nine action areas of the United Nations Climate Action Summit, and introduces China's policies and propositions on international cooperation on climate change and China's achievements in addressing climate change.

As the world's largest developing country, China regards the fight against climate change as an intrinsic requirement of its own sustainable development and a responsibility to build a community of human destinations.It will continue to overcome the many difficult challenges to its development, firmly uphold multilateralism, implement international commitments and make every effort to fully and effectively implement the Paris Agreement.

The Progress Report on China's Implementation of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development (2019) is China's second progress report following the release of the Progress Report on Implementation in 2017.

The report gives a comprehensive overview of China's actions, progress, challenges and next steps in implementing the 2030 agenda, and shows China's determination and achievements in implementing the new development concept and achieving high-quality development.

The report ’ s examples of precision in poverty reduction, innovation-led development, ecologically literate development, rural revitalization, and joint “one belt, one road ” efforts will serve as useful lessons for other countries in implementing the 2030 agenda.

The report on Earth Big Data for Sustainable Development Goals showcases China's exploration and practice of using Earth Big Data to support the implementation of the 2030 agenda and policy decision-making. It also reveals the application value and prospects of relevant technologies and methods for monitoring and assessing the sustainable development goals. It provides a new perspective and support for the international community to fill the data and methodological gaps and accelerate the implementation of the 2030 agenda.

According to the decision of Vietnamese President Nguyen Phu Trong to award the Medal of Independence on 21 September, 12 collectives and 13 individuals from the Lao National Assembly, organs of the National Assembly, the Secretariat of the National Assembly and other organs were awarded the Medal of Independence in recognition of their positive contribution to consolidating and strengthening the special solidarity between the National Assembly and organs of the National Assembly of Viet Nam.

The collective and individual members of the Lao National Assembly who have been awarded the Order of Independence, the Order of Friendship and the Order of Friendship have expressed their gratitude to the State of Viet Nam for bestowing on them an honour not only their honour but also that of the Lao National Assembly.
In the United States, e-cigarettes caused 805 cases of lung damage in 12 lives.
U.S. health officials said 12 people have died from e-smoking-related illnesses and 805 cases of lung damage linked to e-cigarettes across the country.
The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reported the figures and said it had not identified the specific substance that caused the related illness.
However, most patients reported the use of e-cigarette products containing tetrahydrocannabinol, the main psychoactive compound in cannabis.
The surge in lung cases has been linked to the purchase of contaminated electronic smoke vaporizers on the black market.

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says the 12 deaths occurred in 10 states from California to Florida, and 805 confirmed and suspected cases were reported in 46 states and the U.S. Virgin Islands.
Sales of e-cigarettes have been banned in India and Massachusetts, and flavored e-cigarettes have been banned in New York and Michigan for the past three weeks.
The Trump administration intends to ban e-cigarette products that taste all but tobacco from Oct.

The Chinese, knowing the truth of the southern berry briers, know that what suits others is not necessarily fit for them, but only what suits them is best.
It is with this road confidence and strategic determination that China has created the miracle that has attracted worldwide attention.
